detaileddescription.para:
Construct the smallest rectangle, which include the positions of all entities in view
viewId
id of view
smallest Rectangle, when an background element exist. null otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (BackgroundElement backgroundElement, String viewId, Point middle, Dimension size, Color background)
memberdef.name: BackgroundElementGrafic

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for fixed size rectangle without text When in backgroundElement a name is set, then a border with the name is displayed.
backgroundElement
viewId
Id of view
middle
middlePoint
size
fixed size of element
background
background color, when null then transparent

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for dynamic size rectangle without text When in backgroundElement a name is set, then a border with the name is displayed.
backgroundElement
topLeft
topLeft corner
bottomRight
bottomRight corner
background

memberdef.argsstring: (BackgroundElement backgroundElement, String viewId, Point middle, Color textColor)
memberdef.name: BackgroundElementGrafic

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for fixed size rectangle with text and transparent background When in backgroundElement a name is set, then a border with the name is displayed.
backgroundElement
viewId
Id of view
middle
middlePoint
textColor
color of text

memberdef.argsstring: (BackgroundElement backgroundElement, String viewId, Point topLeft, Point bottomRight, Point middle, Dimension size, Color textColor, Color background)
memberdef.name: BackgroundElementGrafic

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor with all features There a 2 possible cases: (topLeft and bottomRight are both null) xor (middle and size are null) When in backgroundElement a name is set, then a border with the name is displayed.
backgroundElement
viewId
Id of view
topLeft
topLeft corner
bottomRight
bottomRight corner
middle
middlePoint
size
fixed size of element
textColor
color of text
background
background color, when null then transparent
transforms from external to internal coordinate system
Update of GraficGrafic called by BackgroundElement.setData and BackgroundElementGragic.updateInit()
paint background element as JLayeredPane with a JLabel for background-image and a JLabel for text Works only when sizeIntern is known.
The Constructor is called by BackgroundElement.createGrafic
